title: How to Create an About Me Page on eBay

steps.headline: Log into your eBay account.
steps.description: Go to the start of the setup page by clicking here and click on the "Create Your Page" button at the bottom.

steps.headline: Choose a design option.
steps.description: You can either choose eBay's own process or enter in your own prepared HTML code to create your page with.

steps.headline: Write your title and short story.
steps.description: Think of a unique title that summarizes best of what you are selling or buying. Short stories can be a short and sweet history of you, including how you found eBay, what specific items you have interest in, or what the first item you bidded on or sold.

steps.headline: Add images.
steps.description: Show off a sample line of products you are selling. You can also insert your company logo in here.

steps.headline: Customize your feedback options and links.
steps.description: Allowing others to see your feedback will greatly increase their knowledge of you.

steps.headline: Choose a layout format.
steps.description: Scroll down to double check your information before finalizing your page.

text: Log into your eBay account. Go to the start of the setup page by clicking here and click on the "Create Your Page" button at the bottom. Choose a design option. You can either choose eBay's own process or enter in your own prepared HTML code to create your page with. Write your title and short story. Think of a unique title that summarizes best of what you are selling or buying. Short stories can be a short and sweet history of you, including how you found eBay, what specific items you have interest in, or what the first item you bidded on or sold. Add images. Show off a sample line of products you are selling. You can also insert your company logo in here. Customize your feedback options and links. Allowing others to see your feedback will greatly increase their knowledge of you. Choose a layout format. Scroll down to double check your information before finalizing your page.
